item.title: Buid Home Raspberry Pi NAS
item.description: NAS, or Network Attached Storage, is a specialized storage device connected to a network, providing centralized file-level data access to multiple users and devices. It facilitates convenient data sharing, backup, and storage management within a local network environment. In this tutorial, I will go trough the process of buding a working NAS using raspberry pi and external drive as well as a plex server for video streaming at home netowrk. I will also explain the neccesarry problems that enconterd and the solution of the problems.
